Name: The Dandy
Instructions: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: Bénédictine adds both saffron flavour and vivid yellow colour to this cognac based cocktail with maraschino contributing fruity notes. Champagne dries and provides effervescence and body to this well-balanced cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2014 at Hawksmoor Spitalfields in London, England. In turn, this apparently comes from a punch served at New York's Waldorf-Astoria in the 1930s.
